
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/Can-daydayup/p/18750340" title="发布于 2025-03-04 13:15">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">.NET 10首个预览版发布：重大改进与新特性概览！</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202503/1336199-20250304131252212-1627309401.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>前言</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>.NET 团队于2025年2月25日发布博文，宣布推出 .NET 10 首个预览版更新，重点改进.NET Runtime、SDK、Libraries 、C#、ASP.NET Core、Blazor 和.NET MAUI 等。</span></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>.NET 10介绍</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>.NET 10 是 .NET 9 的后继版本，将作为长期支持维护 （LTS） 版本提供 3 年的支持。</span></p>
<h3 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>下载 .NET 10</span></h3>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><a href="https://dotnet.microsoft.com/zh-cn/download/dotnet/10.0" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span>https://dotnet.microsoft.com/zh-cn/download/dotnet/10.0</span></a></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202503/1336199-20250304131309334-1748679236.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>.NET runtime</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>.NET 10 运行时在 Preview 1 中引入了新特性与性能改进，核心目标之一是降低常用语言特性的抽象开销（如虚方法调用）。为此，JIT 编译器的去虚拟化能力已扩展至数组接口方法，可优化包含虚方法调用的数组遍历代码。此外，JIT 支持对不含 GC 指针的固定大小值类型数组进行栈分配，减少引用类型的内存开销。</span></p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>另一重要特性是新增对 x64 处理器的 AVX10.2 指令集支持（默认关闭）。由于当前硬件尚未普及，开发者需等待支持 AVX10.2 的 CPU 上市后，通过&nbsp;<code><span>System.Runtime.Intrinsics.X86.Avx10v2</span></code><span>&nbsp;类测试新内在函数。</span></span></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>.NET libraries</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>.NET 10 类库新增多项功能：</span></p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><span>FindByThumbprint 方法支持非 SHA-1 哈希算法（如 SHA-256）搜索证书指纹。</span></li>
</ul>
<pre data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span data-cacheurl="" data-remoteid=""><code><span>X509Certificate2Collection coll = store.Certificates.FindByThumbprint(HashAlgorithmName.SHA256, thumbprint);<br><span>Debug.Assert(coll.Count &lt; 2,&nbsp;"Collection has too many matches, has SHA-2 been broken?"<span>);<br>return<span>&nbsp;coll.SingleOrDefault();<br></span></span></span></span></code></span></pre>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><span>新增直接读取 ASCII 编码的 PEM 格式文件支持。</span></li>
<li>ISOWeek 类扩展 DateOnly 类型兼容性，简化周数计算(<a href="https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/blob/main/src/libraries/System.Private.CoreLib/src/System/Globalization/ISOWeek.cs" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/blob/main/src/libraries/System.Private.CoreLib/src/System/Globalization/ISOWeek.cs</a>)。</li>
</ul>
<pre data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span data-cacheurl="" data-remoteid=""><code><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; public static class ISOWeek<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; {<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; // 新的重载方法<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; public static int GetWeekOfYear(DateOnly date);<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; public static int GetYear(DateOnly date);<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; public static DateOnly ToDateOnly(int year, int week, DayOfWeek dayOfWeek);<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; }<br></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></code></span></pre>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><span><span>ZipArchive 性能和内存改进。</span></span></li>
<li><code><span>OrderedDictionary&lt;TKey,TValue&gt;</span></code><span>&nbsp;的&nbsp;<code><span>TryAdd</span></code><span>&nbsp;和&nbsp;<code><span>TryGetValue</span></code><span>&nbsp;方法返回条目索引，便于快速定位。</span></span></span></li>
</ul>
<pre data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span data-cacheurl="" data-remoteid=""><code><span>public class OrderedDictionary&lt;TKey, TValue&gt;<br><span>{<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; // 新的重载方法<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; public bool TryAdd(TKey key, TValue value, out int index);<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; public bool TryGetValue(TKey key, out TValue value, out int index);<br><span>}<br><br><span>public static void IncrementValue(OrderedDictionary&lt;string, int&gt; orderedDictionary, string key)<br><span>{<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; // Try to add a new key with value 1.<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;if<span>&nbsp;(!orderedDictionary.TryAdd(key, 1, out int index))<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; {<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; // Key was present, so increment the existing value instead.<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; int value = orderedDictionary.GetAt(index).Value;<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; orderedDictionary.SetAt(index, value + 1);<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; }<br><span>}<br></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></code></span></pre>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><span>允许在 JsonSourceGenerationOptionsAttribute 中指定 ReferenceHandler ，JSON 序列化得到了增强。</span></li>
<li><span>等等...</span></li>
</ul>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>.NET SDK</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>.NET 10 SDK 引入了以下新功能和增强功能：</span></p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li>框架提供的包引用修剪：<a href="https://learn.microsoft.com/zh-cn/dotnet/core/whats-new/dotnet-10/sdk#pruning-of-framework-provided-package-references" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://learn.microsoft.com/zh-cn/dotnet/core/whats-new/dotnet-10/sdk#pruning-of-framework-provided-package-references</a></li>
</ul>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>从 .NET 10 开始，NuGet Audit 功能现在可以修剪项目中未使用的框架提供的包引用。此功能默认对所有 net 目标框架（例如 net8.0、net10.0）以及 .NET Standard 2.0 及更高版本启用。这一改进减少了构建过程中需要恢复（restore）和分析的包数量，从而可能加快构建速度、减少磁盘空间占用，并降低 NuGet Audit 或其他依赖扫描机制的误报率。</span></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>ASP.NET Core</span></h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><span>Blazor：添加了QuickGrid的RowClass参数，以及将Blazor脚本作为静态Web资源提供</span></li>
<li><span>OpenAPI：增加了生成 OpenAPI 3.1 文档以及在 YAML 格式中提供生成的 OpenAPI 文档的支持。</span></li>
<li><span>身份验证和授权：增加了身份验证和授权的新功能。</span></li>
<li><span>为SignalR和Minimal APIs添加了新功能。</span></li>
</ul>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>.NET MAUI</span></h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><span>详细介绍：https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/maui/whats-new/dotnet-10?view=net-maui-9.0</span></li>
</ul>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>此版本主要针对 .NET MAUI、.NET for Android、.NET for iOS、Mac Catalyst、macOS 和 tvOS 进行了质量改进。</span></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>EF Core</span></h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><span>LINQ 和 SQL 转换增强功能。</span></li>
<li><code><span>ExecuteUpdateAsync</span></code><span>方法现在支持接受常规的非表达式形式 Lambda（例如包含代码块的语句 Lambda），简化批量更新操作的异步执行代码编写。</span></li>
</ul>
<blockquote>
<p><span>此更新显著提升了 EF Core 在处理复杂查询。</span></p>
</blockquote>
<pre data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span data-cacheurl="" data-remoteid=""><code><span>await context.Blogs.ExecuteUpdateAsync(s =&gt;<br><span>{<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; s.SetProperty(b =&gt; b.Views, 8);<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;if<span>&nbsp;(nameChanged)<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; {<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; s.SetProperty(b =&gt; b.Name,&nbsp;"foo"<span>);<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; }<br><span>});<br></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></code></span></pre>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>C# 14</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>C# 14 引入了许多新特性和增强功能，以提高开发者的生产力和代码质量。其中一些关键更新包括：</span></p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><span>nameof 支持未绑定的泛型类型。</span></li>
<li><span>隐式 Span 转换。</span></li>
<li><span>字段支持的属性。</span></li>
<li><span>简单 <span>Lambda 参数的修饰符。</span></span></li>
<li><span>等...</span></li>
</ul>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>WinForms</span></h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><span>与剪贴板相关的序列化和反序列化更改。</span></li>
<li><span>弃用了剪贴板 API。</span></li>
<li><span>新增了与剪贴板相关的 API。</span></li>
</ul>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>参考文章</span></h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><a href="https://devblogs.microsoft.com/dotnet/dotnet-10-preview-1" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span>https://devblogs.microsoft.com/dotnet/dotnet-10-preview-1</span></a></li>
<li><a href="https://learn.microsoft.com/zh-cn/dotnet/core/whats-new/dotnet-10/overview" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span>https://learn.microsoft.com/zh-cn/dotnet/core/whats-new/dotnet-10/overview</span></a></li>
</ul>
<div id="gtx-trans" style="position: absolute; left: 38px; top: 3934.63px">&nbsp;</div>
